reviewText: I love this DVD. I'm fortunate to have an incredible home theater system (162" front projection, 9-speaker Yamaha sound system) in my loft with 14' ceilings. When something is great on this system it's just totally amazing. (But this system can also be very unkind, it makes plain any deficiencies in the video or audio.)Luis Miguel "Vivo" (DTS) has zero deficiencies. None. It's an amazing concert video.If you are looking for a great concert on DVD, impressive lighting & visual effects, great 6.1 channel DTS audio, an energetic audience (having a great time), a dynamic performance with lots of excitement, then "Vivo" is for you. It builds exactly like a great concert should, lots of passion and increasing energy. The editing was outstanding, combining well-recorded video footage from many cameras. The editors know how to manage pace, just like any good DJ, and the concert successfully builds up energy throughout. This was a high production value concert with some very good laser-work, visual effects, and pyrotechnics.If you have a large-screen system (like home theater), along with a good audio setup, you will totally "fall into" this concert. It's nearly as good as being there live and up front. I've already watched this DVD three or four times completely and many more partial viewings. You definitely won't grow tired of this great performance and recording.In case it's not already quite clear, I think this is an amazing DVD! The DTS audio is very well done, with great use of soundstage and separation to reproduce the feel of a concert arena. This DVD makes a great example for the wonders of DTS. Enjoy!
summary: Great concert, super DTS audio, high production value. 5/5!

reviewText: This DVD rocks!!! I dont know exactly in what city it was recorded, but the sound quality is amazing, He's the best pop singer I've ever known, and somehing I really like about him, is that he does not abandon his native language: Spanish.He knows how to combine sweet ballads with great pop songs that makes you get up from your seat!!If you liked his early albums, I guarantee that you'll love this DVD.I hope Luis Miguel releases another one.
Title: N/A

reviewText: After reading all the great reviews here I decided to buy this DVD.  One of the reviewers said it is better than the Eagles' Hell Freezes Over DVD.  That's basically what made me decide to buy it.I find that the first 2 songs and the last half hour of the concert are pretty good.  The hour in between though seems kind of slow.  So I rate it 3/5.  I think if you know Spanish that would help since it is all sung in Spanish.  However I don't, so I can only comment on the music itself, not on the lyrics.  Also note there are no subtitles.  Subtitles would have helped me.

reviewText: The Amazon Ad states Region 1. What I received was a Region 4 and does not work inthe USA.  My advice is to contact the seller first to be sure it is the correctregion for wherever you reside. I complained and Amazon gave me am immediate full refund as well as paying for the return shipping.
Title: N/A

reviewText: VivoOutstanding live concert by the current king of Latin crooners, Luis Miguel.  Superior orchestra, background singers, filming, stage production values, lighting and editing.  All of the songs are winners.  The finale with fireworks is dramatic and exciting.  A must own for any fan of Luis Miguel.  Interestingly, it's a very different, more mature, style than the earlier excellent concert, El Concierto.
summary: LUIS MIGUEL AT HIS EXCITING BEST!!

reviewText: The DVD sports surround sound ... dolby digital ... etc etc but those fans that are aficionados of music DVD's and true surround sound will be in for a severe disappointment. Not on is the video questionble quality, I've seen better video equipment used by undergarduates of film studies, but the sound .. the sound .. is bad bad bad ....I mean give me a break I had to take the DVD and check out id this was cut in two channel stereo. The producerc should be ashamed of themselves ... maybe becaus their office is near the Miami airport they really never listened to this DVD!So unless,as I said, you are a die hard fan that would even love to hear Luis Miguel sing with his mouth taped shut .... don't waste your hard earned cash !
summary: You have to be a die hard fan to appreciate this DVD ....

reviewText: Este concierto me lo compro' mi hijo de regalo de Navidad, estaba en mi lista de deseos. Permitanme decirles, que maravilloso concierto!  Musica sin parar, una coleccion de canciones una mejor que la otra....una actuacion increible de este cantante...el video es nitido, y el sonido es increible.  Se los recomiendo mucho, sean o no fanaticos de este cantante.
